comments:
Description:
ParseException is thrown when run attached file text-html-image

Steps to reproduce:
1. Run attached file text_html_image.xml through ReportRunner

Results:
org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.template.ParseException: 
Encountered "<image" at line 5, column 65.
Was expecting one of:
    "</image" ...
    <TEXT> ...
    
	at 
org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.template.Parser.generateParseException
(Parser.java:601)
	at 
org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.template.Parser.jj_consume_token
(Parser.java:483)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.template.Parser.Image
(Parser.java:112)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.template.Parser.Template
(Parser.java:227)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.template.Parser.parse
(Parser.java:16)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.template.TemplateParser.parse
(TemplateParser.java:13)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.ir.TextItemDesign.getExpressions
(TextItemDesign.java:55)
	at 
org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.data.dte.ReportQueryBuilder$QueryBuilderVisitor.v
isitTextItem(ReportQueryBuilder.java:450)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.ir.TextItemDesign.accept
(TextItemDesign.java:110)
	at 
org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.data.dte.ReportQueryBuilder$QueryBuilderVisitor.h
andleCell(ReportQueryBuilder.java:770)
	at 
org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.data.dte.ReportQueryBuilder$QueryBuilderVisitor.h
andleRow(ReportQueryBuilder.java:758)
	at 
org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.data.dte.ReportQueryBuilder$QueryBuilderVisitor.v
isitGridItem(ReportQueryBuilder.java:256)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.ir.GridItemDesign.accept
(GridItemDesign.java:117)
	at 
org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.data.dte.ReportQueryBuilder$QueryBuilderVisitor.b
uildQuery(ReportQueryBuilder.java:187)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.data.dte.ReportQueryBuilder.build
(ReportQueryBuilder.java:119)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.data.dte.DteDataEngine.prepare
(DteDataEngine.java:178)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ReportExecutor.execute
(ReportExecutor.java:137)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.impl.RunAndRenderTask.run
(RunAndRenderTask.java:151)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.ReportRunner.executeReport
(ReportRunner.java:178)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.ReportRunner.execute
(ReportRunner.java:115)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.ReportRunner.main
(ReportRunner.java:86)

The problem is caused by missing IMAGE close tag. According to ROM Text Spec,
the close tag for IMAGE is required.

Verified in build 20051116.
Related design file will be modified.

traces.message: Encountered "<image" at line 5, column 65. Was expecting one of:     "</image" ...     <TEXT> ...
